筓字的基本解释

筓
jī
古同“笄”

筓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jī］
同“笄1”。

筓字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　筓； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页883第12
【廣韻】古奚切【韻會】【正韻】堅奚切，?音雞。【說文】簪也。【禮·內則】十有五年而筓。【儀禮·士昏禮】女子許嫁，筓而醴之，稱字。【釋名】筓，係也。所以係冠使不墜也。【儀禮疏】凡筓有二種，一是安髮之筓，男子、婦人俱有。一是爲冠筓，皮弁爵弁筓，惟男子有而婦人無也。又大夫、士與妻用象，天子、諸侯之后、夫人用玉爲筓。【詩·鄘風】君子偕老，副筓六珈。【周禮·天官·追師】掌王后之首服，爲副編次，追衡筓。　又地名。【左傳·成二年】師次于靡筓之下。【註】靡筓，山名。【括地志】靡筓山，一名磨筓山。在蔚州飛狐縣東北百五十里。【水經注】筓頭山，在潘城南。

筓字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体旧字形
筓字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo Character Department] 　筓; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 883 No. 12
[Guang Yun] Gu Xiqie [Rhyme Club] [Zheng Yun] Jian Xiqie, sound chicken. 【Said the text】Han also. [Li·Nei Ze] ten to five years old. 【Rituals·Shifu】Women are allowed to marry, and they are called Chinese characters. [Release Name] Jun, Department also. So tie the crown so that it does not fall. 【Etiquette Shu】There are two kinds of mortal junks, one is Anfa junks, both men and women. One is Guanjun, Pibianjuebian, only men have it, but women don't. Doctors, scholars and wives used elephants, and after emperors and princes, wives used jade as junk. 【Poetry·Fengfeng】The gentleman grows old together, and the vice-jun Liujia. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Chasing Master】The first server of the queen, as the deputy editor, chasing Hengjun.　Also place name. [Zuo Zhuan·2nd Year] The teacher is second to Miyun. [Note] Mijun, the name of the mountain. [Including geography] Miyunshan, a Moyunshan. It is one hundred and fifty miles northeast of Feihu County, Yuzhou. [Shuijing Note] Yuntou Mountain, in the south of Pancheng.
